CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1945, pg. 25 reads: "Gay Doings - Merchant Seaman Theodore H. Bell was given a party by his father, Howard J. Bell, at their Northside home on Monday night. Mr. Bell is enjoying a thirty-day leave from sea duty. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women gathered around Theodore H. Bell seated in ornate armchair between two women, in home of Howard J .Bell, Northside
